entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Freezing rain north of Terrenceville. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers and drizzle. Fog patches late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
